sentence.Network_en: In the last half century, no congressional statute has failed this test.

sentence.Network_en: The associative current gathered strength during the first half - century of national independence.
sentence.Network_cn: 在国家独立后最早的五十年中,结社的潮流日见有力.

sentence.Network_en: In the last half - century he seems almost to have shed his mental skin every decade.
sentence.Network_cn: 过去五十年来,他几乎每隔十年好象就要在精神上蜕皮一次.
